attributes.title: Worst experience ever
attributes.review: I opened the app and was instantly bombarded with racist quotes and really specific rants about the texture of Muslim birthday cakes and how they are worse than Satan’s butthole.

attributes.title: Don’t do it!
attributes.review: This app took forever to download. Doesn’t let you use it without a phone number and if you give them your number it texts you 50 times a day!!! My phone slowed down immediately after downloading.

attributes.title: Not an American App
attributes.review: Donald’s  Dumps app - worst switch and bait ever.   Not an American app - do you hear the whispers and echos.  Slow to download, slow to open and keeps crashing when looking for how America was made Great Again!!!!  Spyware
